properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
TOGO.
DNC 01.
1. M/V HIJACKED IN VICINITY OF 06-01-12N 001-16-26E
   AT 120100Z MAY. VESSEL AND CREW REPORTED SAFE.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS AREA
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
   AND TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 191943Z MAY 19.
